entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 10.
